price: Icabujije nya mwamikazi gusenga Imana Imwe Rudende Allah, ni uko yasenga mu gishingo cayo ibigirwamana kuko yakuriye mu bagarariji, ahandi ho nya mwamikazi yari ashoboye gutandukanya ukuri n’ikinyoma.
arabic: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعۡبُدُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهَا كَانَتۡ مِن قَوۡمٖ كَٰفِرِينَ

meta.transliteration: waṣaddahā mā kānat taʿbudu min dūni al-lahi innahā kānat min qawmin kāfirīna
